products.name: AMD Ryzen 9 5900X
products.description: The AMD Ryzen 9 5900X is a high-performance 12-core processor designed for gaming and multi-threaded applications.
reviews: Excellent processor for gaming and productivity tasks.
Impressive performance and smooth multitasking.
Overclocks well and stays cool under load.

products.name: Intel Core i9-11900K
products.description: The Intel Core i9-11900K is a high-end 8-core processor designed for enthusiasts and gamers.
reviews: Impressive single-core performance, great for gaming.
High clock speeds and good overclocking potential.
Runs a bit hot, but manageable with proper cooling.

products.name: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
products.description: The AMD Ryzen 7 5800X is an 8-core processor optimized for high-performance gaming and content creation.
reviews: Fast and efficient processor for gaming and streaming.
Excellent multi-core performance for productivity tasks.
Cool and quiet operation even during heavy workloads.

products.name: ASUS ROG Strix X570-E Gaming
products.description: The ASUS ROG Strix X570-E Gaming is a high-end motherboard designed for AMD Ryzen processors with PCIe 4.0 support.

features.PCIe_slots: 3 x PCIe 4.0 x16, 2 x PCIe 4.0 x1

reviews: Premium motherboard with top-notch features and performance.
Great for gaming and content creation with PCIe 4.0 support.
RGB lighting adds a nice aesthetic to the build.

products.name: GIGABYTE B550 AORUS Pro
products.description: The GIGABYTE B550 AORUS Pro is a mid-range motherboard with support for AMD Ryzen processors and PCIe 4.0.

features.PCIe_slots: 2 x PCIe 4.0 x16, 1 x PCIe 3.0 x16, 2 x PCIe 3.0 x1

reviews: Affordable motherboard with excellent performance.
Solid build quality and good VRM for overclocking.
Great for gaming and daily computing tasks.

products.name: MSI MAG B560M Bazooka
products.description: The MSI MAG B560M Bazooka is a micro-ATX motherboard designed for Intel's 10th and 11th Gen Core processors.

features.PCIe_slots: 1 x PCIe 4.0 x16, 2 x PCIe 3.0 x1

reviews: Compact and feature-rich motherboard for smaller builds.
Works great with Intel's 11th Gen Core processors.
Decent overclocking potential for a micro-ATX board.

products.name: Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro 16GB
products.description: Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro is a high-performance DDR4 memory module with vibrant RGB lighting.
reviews: Fast and reliable memory with eye-catching RGB lighting.
Easy to configure RGB effects with Corsair's software.
Overclocks well and remains stable.

products.name: G.SKILL Trident Z RGB 32GB
products.description: G.SKILL Trident Z RGB is a premium DDR4 memory kit known for its excellent performance and customizable RGB lighting.
reviews: Top-notch memory kit with impressive RGB lighting effects.
Rock-solid stability and great performance in heavy tasks.
High-speed memory ideal for gaming and content creation.

products.name: Corsair Dominator Platinum 32GB
products.description: Corsair Dominator Platinum is a high-end DDR4 memory kit with a sleek design and superior performance.
reviews: Great RAM for enthusiasts and high-performance systems.
Effective heat spreaders ensure stable operation under load.
Lacks RGB lighting but makes up for it with performance.

products.name: EVGA Supernova 850 G5
products.description: The EVGA Supernova 850 G5 is a high-quality power supply with 850W output and fully modular cables.

features.protections: Over Voltage, Under Voltage, Over Current, Short Circuit, Over Temperature

reviews: Excellent power supply with stable voltage output.
Full modular design makes cable management a breeze.
Efficient and quiet operation even under heavy loads.

products.name: Corsair RM750x
products.description: The Corsair RM750x is a reliable power supply with 750W output and a quiet 135mm fan.

features.protections: Over Voltage, Under Voltage, Over Current, Short Circuit, Over Temperature

reviews: Rock-solid power supply with stable performance.
Full modular cables offer flexibility in cable management.
Efficient and quiet operation for a peaceful computing experience.

products.name: Antec Signature PLATINUM 1300
products.description: The Antec Signature PLATINUM 1300 is a high-efficiency power supply with a power output of 1300W.

features.protections: Over Voltage, Under Voltage, Over Current, Short Circuit, Over Temperature

reviews: Powerful PSU with stable output and high efficiency.
Semi-modular design balances cable management and flexibility.
Runs quietly even under intense workloads.

products.name: Samsung 970 EVO 1TB NVMe
products.description: The Samsung 970 EVO is a high-speed NVMe SSD with a capacity of 1TB for blazing-fast storage performance.
reviews: Super-fast NVMe SSD, excellent for OS and software.
Impressive read and write speeds for faster data transfers.
Reliable and durable storage solution for heavy workloads.

products.name: Western Digital Blue 500GB SATA SSD
products.description: The Western Digital Blue SATA SSD offers reliable and high-speed storage with a capacity of 500GB.
reviews: Affordable and fast SATA SSD, perfect for upgrading laptops.
Reliable performance and consistent read/write speeds.
SATA III interface ensures compatibility with various devices.

products.name: Seagate BarraCuda 2TB HDD
products.description: The Seagate BarraCuda is a spacious 2TB HDD providing ample storage for large files and media.
reviews: High-capacity HDD for storing large files and media libraries.
Reliable and consistent performance for data backups.
7200 RPM rotational speed provides decent read/write speeds.

products.name: LG 27GL850-B 32 Inch
products.description: The LG 27GL850-B is a 32-inch gaming monitor with a high refresh rate and QHD resolution.
reviews: Superb gaming monitor with excellent color reproduction.
High refresh rate and low response time for smooth gameplay.
Large screen size provides an immersive gaming experience.

products.name: ASUS ROG Swift PG279Q 42 Inch
products.description: The ASUS ROG Swift PG279Q is a 42-inch gaming monitor with a fast refresh rate and G-Sync support.
reviews: High-quality 4K gaming monitor with G-Sync support.
Smooth and responsive gaming experience with 144Hz refresh rate.
Great color accuracy and wide viewing angles with IPS panel.

products.name: Dell S2721QS 27 Inch
products.description: The Dell S2721QS is a 27-inch 4K monitor offering stunning visuals and a sleek design.
reviews: Affordable 4K monitor with vibrant colors and crisp visuals.
Ideal for productivity and media consumption.
Sleek design and slim bezels complement any workspace.

products.name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080
products.description: The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 is a high-end graphics card designed for exceptional gaming and rendering performance.
reviews: Incredible graphics card for gaming at 4K resolution.
Ray tracing capabilities add a new level of realism to games.
The card runs quiet and cool even under heavy load.

products.name: Logitech G Pro Wireless
products.description: The Logitech G Pro Wireless is a top-tier gaming mouse with exceptional accuracy and wireless performance.
reviews: One of the best wireless gaming mice I've ever used.
Lightweight design allows for quick and precise movements.
Long battery life ensures no interruptions during gaming sessions.

products.name: Logitech G PRO Tenkeyless RGB Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
products.description: The Logitech G PRO Tenkeyless RGB Mechanical Gaming Keyboard features responsive Romer-G switches and customizable RGB lighting.
reviews: Great compact keyboard for gaming setups with limited space.
Romer-G switches feel smooth and responsive.
RGB lighting customization adds a nice touch to the overall setup.
